alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Daviess; Henderson; Hopkins; McLean; Union; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 11:17PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Daviess, southeastern Henderson, northeastern Crittenden, McLean, northeastern Hopkins, southern Union and Webster Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1016 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from Sturgis to Clay to Sebree to near Calhoun. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Calhoun, Sebree, Clay, Dixon, and Beech Grove around 1020 PM CDT. Livermore around 1030 PM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 165 between Mile Markers 67 and 69. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 121 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Crittenden; Daviess; Henderson; Hopkins; McLean; Union; Webster
